scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: sass assets/css/style.scss dist/css/style.css --no-source-map && sass assets/css/swiper-bundle.scss dist/css/swiper-bundle.css --no-source-map
scripts.build:js: babel assets/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.js && babel assets/js/scrollreveal.min.js -o dist/js/scrollreveal.min.js && babel assets/js/swiper-bundle.js -o dist/js/swiper-bundle.js
